Using Marketing Data to Get Measurable Results

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1512677536464{margin-top: 20px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”]Nothing gets people riled up like sports do – and successful brands know that piggybacking off of that passion and engagement is a great way to get more customers. Add in marketing automation – and you’ve got a recipe for success.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”In this issue of Agency Perspectives, you’ll learn how to:” font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1512408845717{margin-top: 20px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;}” el_class=”sm-hide”][vc_column_text el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron sm-hide” css=”.vc_custom_1512408166490{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”]

  • Use data to engage sports fans in a personalized and meaningful way.
  • Track all of your initiatives so you can measure the value of your partnerships.
  • Evaluate and improve your own approach to sports partnerships.

[/vc_column_text]

Tom Huggins

Greenroom Digital

“There has never been a better time to implement a data-driven approach to sports partnerships. It gives you a measurable return on your marketing investments, a leg up on the competition, and a strong case for how a data-driven approach could benefit your business across the board.”

What is Agency Perspectives?
[vc_column_text el_class=”sm-hide”]Agency Perspectives lets you hear directly from other agencies about how they are using marketing automation to create higher value relationships, build monthly recurring revenue, and prove value to clients. It’s available exclusively from SharpSpring.
